title: Support custom tunings
description: Currently hardcoded to standard tuning (EADGBE). Should allow users to select or define custom tunings for compositions and OMR imports.

title: Add notation toggle (TAB + standard notation)
description: Currently TAB-only display. AlphaTab supports TAB + standard notation combo display. Should be easy to implement as a toggle option.

title: Set up frontend build process
description: No bundler or minification configured. Set up: Vite or esbuild for bundling, minification for production, source maps for debugging, separate vendor libraries, tree shaking for unused code.

title: Add rate limiting to backend
description: Protect API endpoints from abuse. Add Flask-Limiter for /api/assistant, /api/composer/suggest, and /api/omr endpoints. Consider per-IP and per-endpoint limits.

title: Add logging and monitoring
description: No error tracking or structured logging currently. Implement: structured logging in backend, error tracking (Sentry integration), performance monitoring, request/response logging.

title: Persist OMR jobs to database
description: OMR jobs are stored in-memory and lost on server restart. Implement SQLite or similar persistent storage for job tracking. Include job status, results, and timestamps.

title: Chord delete bug breaks multi-note chords
description: Deleting one note from a multi-note chord breaks the chord apart. Example: (1.3 12.5 2.2 3.1).4 → deletes 1st note → becomes 12.5.4 2.2.4 3.1.4. Root cause: reflowMeasure() doesn't preserve time-based grouping. Location: js/composer.js reflowMeasure()

title: Update composer.js alphaTab DOM handling
description: TODO at js/composer.js line 132: 'Update for alphaTab DOM structure'. Direct TAB line editing needs to be updated for current alphaTab DOM structure.

title: Validate GPT response data
description: No input validation on AI responses from OpenAI. Add schema validation to ensure GPT suggestions conform to expected TabComposition format before applying to UI.

title: Add MIDI export
description: Export compositions to MIDI format for use in DAWs and other music software.

title: Add OMR job cleanup mechanism
description: Old OMR jobs accumulate indefinitely in memory and filesystem. Implement automatic cleanup of jobs older than 7 days. Include cleanup of temporary files in omr_output directories.

title: Add automated test suite
description: Zero test coverage currently. Need to add: Jest/Vitest for frontend unit tests, pytest for backend, integration tests for OMR pipeline and composer logic. Priority areas: reflowMeasure(), alphaTab adapter, OMR conversion.

title: Add Guitar Pro (.gp5) import/export
description: AlphaTab supports Guitar Pro format but it's not integrated yet. Was planned as Phase 3 of alphaTab integration. Should include track picker UI for multi-track files.

title: Add cloud sync for compositions
description: localStorage has 5MB limit per domain. Implement cloud sync/backup to prevent data loss and enable cross-device access. Currently sharing requires backend but relies on 90-day expiration.
